snippet: Global capital flows declined in both 2011 and 2012, when they were 61 percent lower than in the peak year of 2007, according to estimates by the McKinsey Global Institute.
lead_paragraph: Global capital flows declined in both 2011 and 2012, when they were 61 percent lower than in the peak year of 2007, according to estimates by the McKinsey Global Institute.

headline.seo: Off the Charts: More Money Stays at Home
headline.main: Off the Charts: More Money Stays at Home
